About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

This year I wanted to better my life and the life for my family. So I decided to pursue a career in web development. With hard work, determination, and self motivation, I am making that dream come true.

Base Languages

Http, CSS, and Javascript

I feel very comfortable these. I have had much practice with them making mock sites. I feel like I can use these in a professional environment.

Tools

JQuery, Bootstrap, Sass, Git, and Node.js

I have used all of these in different projects. I have more experience with Git and Node.js then the other three, but still able to use them efficiently.

Framework

React and Angular

Out of these two, I have used React more in practice but I am learning Angular and looking forward to using it.
